amendatorysection.catchline: Registered lobbyist; statement of activity during regular or special session; when filed.
amendatorysection.para: Within forty-five days of the completion of every regular or special session of the Legislature, each registered lobbyist shall submit to the Clerk of the Legislature a statement listing the legislation upon which the lobbyist acted, including identification by number of any bill or resolution and the position taken by the lobbyist.
